author: koloz193
content: hey all, i trying to test out some blob transactions locally and on devnet12 but regardless of if i use the nethermind sendblobs tool or blob-utils i still seem to get `2023/12/15 08:45:40 failed to send transaction: invalid blob 0: can't verify opening proof` i saw a similar issue from someone back in march https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1031999860997619843/1087872628670341150 but it sounded like it was a geth issue that shouldve been resolved by now. any ideas or better ways to send blob txns?
